TextEng: Sure is good to see a friendly face. What brings you here in the midst of all this chaos? You wouldn't be a new recruit, would you?
Text: 반가운 얼굴을 보니 좋군요. 이 혼란 속에 여긴 어쩐 일이죠? 혹시 새로 온 대원인가요?

TextEng: What brings you here? The guards weren't supposed to let anyone else into the Peninsula District... say, you aren't a new recruit, are you?
Text: 여긴 어쩐 일이죠? 경비대가 반도 지구에 아무나 들여보내면 안 되는데... 잠깐, 새로 온 대원인가요?

TextEng: Who are you and why did the guards let you in here? There's enough trouble in this district without thugs like you... wait, you aren't a new recruit, are you?
Text: 당신은 누구고 왜 경비대가 들여보낸 거죠? 당신 같은 불량배가 없어도 이 지구는 문제가 넘치는데... 잠깐, 새로 온 대원인가요?

TextEng: Sedos Sebile, of the Neverwinter Militia. I'm in charge of the operation here... And you?
Text: 네버윈터 민병대의 세도스 세빌입니다. 여기 작전을 총괄하고 있죠... 당신은요?

TextEng: Look, there's a crisis out there and I have little time for friendly banter. What I need are warm bodies to throw at a problem outside of regular militia duties.
Text: 이봐요, 밖에 위기 상황이라 한가롭게 수다 떨 시간이 없어요. 정규 민병대 임무 외의 문제에 투입할 인력이 필요해요.

TextEng: Remain safe, friend.
Text: 무사하길, 친구.

TextEng: Take care.
Text: 조심해요.

TextEng: Yes, on your way, then.
Text: 네, 그럼 가봐요.

TextEng: Very well. <FirstName> it is. Truth be told, we've got our hands full here in the Peninsula and could use your help... it's a bit outside standard militia duties though.
Text: 알겠어요. <FirstName>이군요. 솔직히 말하면, 반도 지구엔 손이 모자라서 당신의 도움이 필요해요... 정규 민병대 임무와는 좀 다르지만요.

TextEng: An adventurer, hmm? Very well, <FullName>, I could use your help here in the Peninsula... it's a bit outside standard militia duties though.
Text: 모험가라, 흠? 좋아요, <FullName>, 반도 지구엔 당신의 도움이 필요해요... 정규 민병대 임무와는 좀 다르지만요.

TextEng: As you wish. All the same, we've got our hands full here in the Peninsula and could use your help... it's a bit outside standard militia duties though.
Text: 알겠어요. 어쨌든, 반도 지구엔 손이 모자라서 당신의 도움이 필요해요... 정규 민병대 임무와는 좀 다르지만요.

TextEng: With all the prisoners in the streets, we're stretched to the limit just trying to keep the civilians safe... As if the Wailing wasn't enough...
Text: 죄수들이 거리에 가득해서 민간인들을 지키는 것만으로도 한계예요... 울부짖는 죽음 역병만으로도 모자라서...

TextEng: What I need is someone to get inside that prison and figure out what the hell is going on down there.
Text: 필요한 건 저 감옥 안에 들어가서 대체 무슨 일이 벌어지고 있는지 알아낼 사람이에요.

TextEng: They're running the prison like a fortress, sending out raiding parties and then retreating back inside. It's been hard to get a hold of them.
Text: 죄수들이 감옥을 요새처럼 운영하면서 습격대를 보내고는 다시 안으로 후퇴해요. 잡기가 어렵죠.

TextEng: Perhaps, but the prisoners will likely have stripped the place of any valuables, and you're welcome to keep anything you confiscate from them.
Text: 그럴 수도 있지만, 죄수들이 그곳의 귀중품은 다 털어갔을 거예요. 그들에게서 압수한 건 가져도 좋아요.

TextEng: Certainly not. If I gave an advance to every militia member, the city coffers would be empty and the prisoners would still be rioting.
Text: 그건 안 돼요. 민병대원마다 선금을 줬다간 시 금고가 바닥나고 죄수들은 여전히 폭동을 일으키겠죠.

TextEng: Besides the prisoners, you may need to watch out for the Head Gaoler, Alaefin. Recent reports suggest he's the one who set them loose in the first place...
Text: 죄수들 외에도 간수장 알레핀을 조심해야 해요. 최근 보고에 따르면 애초에 그가 죄수들을 풀어줬다고 하거든요...

TextEng: Good luck then, and don't forget to report back to me if you manage to resolve whatever the trouble is down there.
Text: 그럼 행운을 빌어요. 그곳 문제를 해결하면 꼭 저한테 보고하는 거 잊지 마세요.

TextEng: Well, I can lead the horse to water but I can't make <him/her> drink. If you'll excuse me, then, there's lots to do in these troubled times.
Text: 뭐, 말을 물가로 끌고 갈 수는 있어도 물을 마시게 할 수는 없죠. 실례한다면, 이 어려운 시기에 할 일이 많아서요.

TextEng: You again, is it? Have you changed your mind about entering the prison for me?
Text: 또 왔군요? 감옥에 들어가는 것에 대해 마음이 바뀌었나요?

TextEng: Then we have little to talk about and you are wasting valuable time. Excuse me, I have a job to do.
Text: 그럼 더 할 얘기가 없고 귀중한 시간을 낭비하는 거예요. 실례해요, 할 일이 있어서.

TextEng: Let's have a look at that... It's the brain of an intellect devourer, isn't it? So that's why Captain Alaefin was acting so strangely! Of course!
Text: 어디 봅시다... 지성 포식귀의 뇌군요? 그래서 알레핀 대위가 그렇게 이상하게 행동했던 거군요! 물론이지!

TextEng: The intellect devourer was one of the Waterdhavian creatures that Lady Aribeth has been searching for to help cure the plague! You'd better return this to her.
Text: 지성 포식귀는 아리베스 경이 역병 치료를 위해 찾던 워터딥 생명체 중 하나예요! 이걸 그녀에게 가져다주는 게 좋겠어요.

TextEng: I thank you for all the trouble you have taken in completing this task, then. I will speak well of you when I make my report.
Text: 이 임무를 완수하느라 수고하셨어요. 보고할 때 좋게 말씀드릴게요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Success]</Start> True, you appear to have performed admirably under such pressure. Here, take 375 gold, then, and I will make note of it in my report.
Text: <StartCheck>[성공]</Start> 맞아요, 그런 압박 속에서 훌륭히 해낸 것 같군요. 여기, 금화 375개를 받아요. 보고서에 기록해 둘게요.

TextEng: Now, if you'll excuse me, I must prepare that report to present to Lord Nasher. He is not well, but news of your success should lift his spirits some.
Text: 이제 실례한다면, 나셰르 영주님에게 올릴 보고서를 준비해야 해요. 그분이 편찮으시지만, 당신의 성공 소식이 기분을 좀 나아지게 해드릴 거예요.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> This is militia business, <sir/madam>, and we play it by the book. I'll make note of your concern in my report.
Text: <StartCheck>[실패]</Start> 이건 민병대 업무예요, 우리는 원칙대로 해요. 당신의 우려를 보고서에 기록해 둘게요.

TextEng: You had a job to do and you did it. Here's your pay, 300 gold. I'll make note of your attempt to threaten me in my report.
Text: 할 일을 했으니 됐어요. 여기 급료, 금화 300개예요. 저를 협박하려 한 건 보고서에 기록해 둘게요.

TextEng: Indeed, good <sir/madam>. You have performed admirable service and declined all reward. I will speak most highly of you when I make my report.
Text: 정말이군요. 훌륭한 봉사를 하고도 보상을 모두 거절하시다니. 보고할 때 극찬하겠어요.

TextEng: Hello there. I'm glad to see people alive. I'm not sure what happened in the prison, but whatever it was, it's had a big effect on everyone out here.
Text: 안녕하세요. 살아있는 사람을 보니 반갑네요. 감옥에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 모르겠지만, 뭐였든 여기 모두에게 큰 영향을 미쳤어요.

TextEng: As you wish, <sir/madam>, but I have my orders and shall remain here until the job is done.
Text: 알겠어요, 하지만 저는 명령이 있어서 임무가 끝날 때까지 여기 있을 거예요.

TextEng: Excellent. I shall await your return, then.
Text: 좋아요. 그럼 돌아오길 기다릴게요.

TextEng: Do you have evidence to support that you have ended the threat? I cannot report this until we know for sure.
Text: 위협을 끝냈다는 증거가 있나요? 확실히 알기 전에는 보고할 수 없어요.

TextEng: I really must file my report with Lord Nasher. Excuse me, <sir/madam>.
Text: 정말 나셰르 영주님에게 보고서를 제출해야 해요. 실례해요.

TextEng: Bring me proof that you have dealt with whatever you claim was controlling him. Then we shall see about your reward.
Text: 그를 조종했다는 것을 처리한 증거를 가져오세요. 그러면 보상 얘기를 하죠.

TextEng: I think they probably carry keys to get back into the fortress once they've finished looting or whatever. Nobody we've caught has had one, though.
Text: 약탈이든 뭐든 끝나면 요새로 돌아가기 위한 열쇠를 갖고 다닐 거예요. 하지만 우리가 잡은 사람 중엔 가진 사람이 없었어요.

TextEng: Since you can't bust down the front door, you'll have to find the person with that key. I'd start near the sewers in the southwest of the district. We've seen a number of groups around there.
Text: 정문을 부수고 들어갈 수 없으니 그 열쇠를 가진 사람을 찾아야 해요. 지구 남서쪽 하수구 근처에서 시작해 보세요. 그 주변에서 여러 무리를 봤거든요.

TextEng: That said, this is proof enough that you've done the job I required of you. I imagine 300 gold in danger pay will be sufficient.
Text: 그렇긴 해도, 이건 제가 요청한 일을 해냈다는 충분한 증거예요. 위험 수당으로 금화 300개면 될 거예요.

TextEng: Has she now? Well, that's the first bit of welcome news I've heard all day.
Text: 그랬군요? 오늘 들은 첫 번째 반가운 소식이네요.

TextEng: Lady Aribeth's authorized a 300 gold piece bonus to any militia member who can bring me proof that the situation's been resolved. Consider it danger pay.
Text: 아리베스 경이 상황이 해결됐다는 증거를 가져오는 민병대원에게 금화 300개 보너스를 승인했어요. 위험 수당이라 생각하세요.

TextEng: He used to be one of the militia's best and, until now, I'd never heard a bad word said of him. Lord Nasher himself appointed him to the prison's command.
Text: 그는 민병대 최고 중 한 명이었고, 지금까지 나쁜 소리를 들어본 적이 없어요. 나셰르 영주님께서 직접 그를 감옥 지휘관으로 임명하셨죠.

TextEng: Something just doesn't seem right with this picture. I guess the Wailing can change one's perspective on things...
Text: 뭔가 앞뒤가 안 맞아요. 울부짖는 죽음 역병이 사람을 바꾸는 건가...

TextEng: The escaped prisoners seem to be a little less vicious. Certainly they are still dangerous, but whatever was driving the riot seems to be gone. I have no explanation.
Text: 탈옥수들이 좀 덜 사나워진 것 같아요. 물론 여전히 위험하지만, 폭동을 이끌던 뭔가가 사라진 것 같아요. 설명할 순 없지만.

TextEng: Hello again. I hope your search for the cause of the riots goes well. We need all the help we can get here. Have you found anything in the prison?
Text: 또 만났군요. 폭동 원인을 찾는 게 잘 되길 바라요. 여기선 도움이 절실해요. 감옥에서 뭔가 찾았나요?

TextEng: Aribeth has authorized a 300 gold piece reward. If you wish more, we will discuss it when you produce results.
Text: 아리베스께서 금화 300개 보상을 승인하셨어요. 더 원하면 결과를 가져오면 얘기하죠.

TextEng: The escaped prisoners keep sending raiding parties out of the prison. One of them must have a key to get back in.
Text: 탈옥수들이 계속 감옥에서 습격대를 보내고 있어요. 그중 누군가 다시 들어갈 열쇠를 갖고 있을 거예요.

TextEng: You'll have to find who has that key. I don't know any more than that.
Text: 그 열쇠를 가진 사람을 찾아야 해요. 그 이상은 저도 몰라요.

TextEng: Sedos
Text: 세도스

TextEng: Sebile
Text: 세빌

TextEng: Look, if I had the manpower I might be able to get it done, but we are tapped out. The prisoners are organized, running the prison like a fortress. Their raiding parties always retreat back inside
Text: 이봐요, 인력이 있었다면 해낼 수 있었겠지만, 우린 바닥났어요. 죄수들이 조직화돼서 감옥을 요새처럼 운영해요. 습격대는 항상 안으로 후퇴하고.

TextEng: I heard that it was the Waterdhavian intellect devourer behind it, and that the remains of the creature have been turned in to Aribeth already.
Text: 워터딥의 지성 포식귀가 배후라고 들었고, 그 생명체의 잔해는 이미 아리베스에게 전달됐다고 해요.

TextEng: Now I just have to reward the proper person. I will give the payment I earmarked for this task to the person that returned the creature to Aribeth.
Text: 이제 합당한 사람에게 보상하면 돼요. 이 임무에 책정된 급료는 그 생명체를 아리베스에게 가져간 사람에게 줄게요.

TextEng: If you see them, tell them I will be waiting here with their well-deserved wages.
Text: 그들을 보면, 마땅히 받아야 할 급료를 갖고 여기서 기다리고 있다고 전해주세요.

TextEng: Yes, I heard that it was the Waterdhavian intellect devourer. I also heard that you turned the remains of it in to Aribeth. Good work.
Text: 네, 워터딥의 지성 포식귀라고 들었어요. 그 잔해를 아리베스에게 가져다줬다고도 들었고요. 잘했어요.

TextEng: Her word is good enough proof that you did the job. I assume that 300 gold danger pay is sufficient?
Text: 그녀의 말이면 충분한 증거죠. 위험 수당으로 금화 300개면 되죠?
